author: wadaghana
title: Mass Cardano Education for Students
description: Education is key to adoption and use of a service. How can we educate students in Northern Ghana about Cardano Ecosystem and its benefits?
solution: Organize community events to educate about 2,000 tertiary and high school students in northern Ghana about cardano and its benefits.
experience: Wada: Consist of a team of skilled personnel with great experiences in development, education, active Cardano Community practitioners.etc
